New Records: Abdullah Shafique scored the first century on World Cup debut for Pakistan
Key Match Events: Mohammad Rizwan battled cramps to guide Pakistan to a six-wicket win
Hasan's four-wicket haul brought Pakistan back into the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan recorded the highest successful chase in the history of the quadrennial event
Others: Sri Lanka's Kusal Mendis and Sadeera Samarawickrama scored brilliant centuries that went in vain
